yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.cate: Configure when and how health indicators are displayed
Configure health indicator display and entity filtering
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.indi: Choose between hearts (like vanilla Minecraft) or numbers
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.pass: Show health indicators above passive mobs (animals, villagers, etc.)
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.host: Show health indicators above hostile mobs (zombies, skeletons, etc.)
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.play: Show health indicators above other players
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.self: Show your own health indicator in third person view
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.blac: Entities that will never show health indicators (use entity IDs like 'minecraft:armor_stand')
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.cate: Track totem of undying usage above players
yacl3.config.vitalstats:main_config.show: Show totem pop counts above players when they use totems
Display your own totem counter above your head
Display totem counters above other players
